Actions.Text: REFERRED TO ALCOHOLISM AND SUBSTANCE USE DISORDERS
REFERRED TO ALCOHOLISM AND SUBSTANCE USE DISORDERS

Title: Relates to the availability of buprenorphine in opioid treatment programs
Summary: Requires facilities that provide treatment for substance use disorders to have at least one practitioner qualified to administer or prescribe buprenorphine to individuals in their care with substance use disorders related to opioids.
LawCode: Add ยง32.12, Ment Hyg L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the mental hygiene law, in relation to the availability of buprenorphine in opioid treatment programs
